plot: The parents of a coma patient kidnap the daughter of a surgeon who they deem responsible for her near death condition. With the clock ticking, Detective Bain tries to save the kidnapped daughter before time runs out.
plot_en: The parents of a coma patient kidnap the daughter of a surgeon who they deem responsible for her near death condition. With the clock ticking, Detective Bain tries to save the kidnapped daughter before time runs out.
plot_es: The parents of a coma patient kidnap the daughter of a surgeon who they deem responsible for her near death condition. With the clock ticking, Detective Bain tries to save the kidnapped daughter before time runs out.
title: Yr Heliwr: Pechod
